QuestData.Title: The Scale-Lord
QuestData.Description: The saurok at the Lake of Stars take their orders from their Scale-Lord, a vicious, merciless leader who guards his territory fiercely.$B$BIf we can eliminate this leader, then we can gain access to the enormous amber lode beneath the lake.$B$BGo. Their leader gives his orders from his underground dwelling, at the southern edge of the lake.
